title: Root monorepo configuration
description: Create the root-level configuration files that establish the Turborepo monorepo with Bun workspaces. This includes package.json (workspaces, scripts, devDependencies), turbo.json (task pipeline with build/dev/lint/type-check/format), biome.json (formatter + linter + import organizer), root tsconfig.json (minimal, extends typescript-config), .gitignore (comprehensive coverage for all tools), and .env.example (all required environment variables with placeholders).
acceptance_criteria: Root package.json exists with "workspaces": ["apps/*", "packages/*"], "private": true, and packageManager set to bun
Root package.json includes scripts: dev, dev:web, dev:mobile, dev:backend, build, lint, type-check, format
Root package.json includes devDependencies: turbo, @biomejs/biome, typescript
turbo.json defines tasks: build (dependsOn ^build, with outputs), dev (persistent, no cache), lint, type-check, format
biome.json has formatter enabled (2-space indent, 100 line width, LF endings), linter with recommended rules, and assist/import organizer enabled
Root tsconfig.json extends packages/typescript-config/base.json and excludes node_modules, apps, packages
.gitignore covers node_modules, .turbo, dist, .output, .vinxi, .convex, convex/_generated, .expo, .env files, OS files, IDE files
.env.example documents CONVEX_DEPLOYMENT, VITE_CONVEX_URL, VITE_CONVEX_SITE_URL, EXPO_PUBLIC_CONVEX_URL, EXPO_PUBLIC_CONVEX_SITE_URL, BETTER_AUTH_SECRET, SITE_URL
FR-1.1, FR-1.2, FR-1.3, FR-1.4, FR-1.5, FR-1.6, FR-6.1 through FR-6.8 are satisfied
